reviewText: great granddaughter loved it

My granddaughter loves it!!
We love Max. And Ruby, calming unlike most cartoons today. Teaches kindness , patience and good manners.
I purchased this book for my grandson who was going through sibling revelry with his sisterMax & Ruby: Sweet Siblings
My son loves this video best- mainly because it has a lot of train related episodes. I think its his favorite one.

This is a Max and Ruby jam-packed DVD full of 12 episodes.  While I am not a big Max and Ruby fan, my 3 year old daughter does like those silly siblings.  I like how Ruby is so responsible and loving towards her little brother, even though he can be mischievous.  This is a great DVD to have on hand for when my daughter wants to watch the show but its not on.  All these episodes have previously aired on television but it is nice to have all on one DVD.

Episodes:

Max Says Hello

Ruby's Spa Day

Ruby's Tai Chi

Engineer Max

Max's Toy Train

Max's Train Ride

Max and Ruby's Train Trip

Go to Sleep, Max

Conductor Max

Space Bunny

Max's Sprinkler

Max's Pogo Stick
I love all the episodes on here.  Max and Ruby is a house favorite.
Our 3.5 year old loves Max and Ruby!  She has many dvd's and these are her current favorite and are great at teaching patience and kindness.
My grandchildren always enjoy watching Max and Ruby and I approve.  They always set a good example for kids to follow.
We have loved Max & Ruby for years. Our children are similar in age to both Max and Ruby so it is a special show for us.
my 3yo grandson loved Max and Ruby

Bought for a road trip, and it worked!  My girls loved it even the older ones.  Peaceful cartoon all smiles from my girls
My great grandson absolutely loves this Max and Ruby movie. I need to buy it again as he has scratched it by playing it so many times. I might add, he loves all his Max and Ruby movies.
My grandkids are big fans of Max and Ruby, as am I.
